mapper.insert: insert into User(userId, password, email, phone, birth, name) values(#{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{name})
mapper.select: select * from User where userId = #{userId} and password = #{password};
SELECT COUNT(userId) AS totalUsers FROM User;
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET Status = CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 0 END WHERE userId = #{userId};
